item.title: Intro to Independent Author Mailing Lists
item.description: Note: This post gets a little into how the sausage is made. If you’re just here as a reader, you may want to skip this one. Or stick around for some insight into the exciting world of independent marketing. The only thing harder than writing a book is selling a book. I enjoy reading what I wrote, and I think others will too. But helping people to find it in the crowded world of publishing?
